channel.title: Comments on: Assasin Bug And Honey Bee Close Up

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.description: Thank you for the clarification. I appreciate it.
item.content:encoded: Thank you for the clarification. I appreciate it.

item.title: By: NocturnalDez
item.dc:creator: NocturnalDez
item.description: Just to let you know. This is not a honey bee. I believe that, from the picture, one can easily identify it is, in fact, a wasp (possibly yellowjacket). The wings, the yellow legs, the size and shape of the head, eye and mandibles are many tell-tale signs here.
item.content:encoded: Just to let you know. This is not a honey bee. I believe that, from the picture, one can easily identify it is, in fact, a wasp (possibly yellowjacket). The wings, the yellow legs, the size and shape of the head, eye and mandibles are many tell-tale signs here.

item.title: By: Murray Schoenstein
item.dc:creator: Murray Schoenstein
item.description: Fantastic blog, will book mark and share on facebook.
item.content:encoded: Fantastic blog, will book mark and share on facebook.
